mapper.select: select u.username,u.address,o.id,i.`name`, i.price,o.createtime,SUM(i.price) total_amount from `user` u,items i,orders o,orderdetail od WHERE u.id=o.user_id and o.id=od.orders_id and i.id=od.items_id where o.number='1000010' and i.`name`='笔记本' and o.createtime between DATE_FORMAT("2015-02-01","YYYY-MM-DD" and DATE_FORMAT("2015-02-05","YYYY-MM-DD")) and i.price BETWEEN 5000 and 6000
